hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Module
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Only applicable for multi module java project

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
mkdir $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module echo $HOME
#!/bin/bash if [[ $Type == "tomcat" ]]; then
cp tomcat/Dockerfile $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module cp deploy_svc.yaml $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module
sed -i "s/module/${Module}/g" $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module/Dockerfile sed -i "s/repo.war/${War_file_name}.war/g" $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module/Dockerfile
#cat $HOME/$Repo_Name/Dockerfile
sed -i "s/reponame/${Module}/g" $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module/deploy_svc.yaml sed -i "s/namespace:.*/namespace: ${Tenant}/g" $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module/deploy_svc.yaml
#cat $HOME/$Repo_Name/deploy_svc.yaml elif [[ $Type == "nodejs" ]]; then
cp node/Dockerfile $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module cp deploy_svc.yaml $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module
sed -i "s/module/${Repo_Name}/g" $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module/Dockerfile #cat $HOME/$Repo_Name/Dockerfile
sed -i "s/reponame/${Repo_Name}/g" $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module/deploy_svc.yaml sed -i "s/namespace:.*/namespace: ${Tenant}/g" $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module/deploy_svc.yaml
#cat $HOME/$Repo_Name/deploy_svc.yaml fi
rm -rf $HOME/eks-app-platform-config cd $HOME git clone -b dev https://github.com/nagarajui7/eks-app-platform-config.git cd $HOME/eks-app-platform-config cp -R $HOME/$Repo_Name_$Module $HOME/eks-app-platform-config git add . git status git commit -m "files" git push https://nagaraju.batchu1%40gmail.com:N%40Ga%4012345@github.com/nagarajui7/eks-app-platform-config.git dev
